column1:
Jointed Horse

No western party is complete without having a Jointed Horse hanging on your wall.
column4:
>
The horse is already to take a cowboy or cowgirl where ever they may need to go. Decorate your walls also with the Jointed Cowboy and Cowgirl in addition to the jointed horse. The Jointed Horse would also be a great decoration for a derby. The Jointed Horse comes with one per package, and is 38 inches long.

column1:
• Large jointed Horse is 38 inches long approximately 27 1/2 inches high from head to bottom of feet. Printed on one side of card stock material
  • Jointed sections fold up for easy shipping and storage
  • You can bend the horse's joints to make it look like it is standing or a running horse silhouette
  • Hang by tape or mounting tape
  • One (1) per package
